meanings.sent1: The disfunction of the old car's engine caused it to break down frequently.
meanings.sent2: The disfunction of the printer was frustrating as it kept jamming.
meanings.sent3: The disfunction of the clock made it think it was midnight all day long!
meanings.sent4: The disfunction of the team's communication was like a tangled web of wires.
meanings.sent5: The disfunction of the computer system brought the entire office to a standstill.

meanings.sent1: The disfunction of his memory made it hard for him to remember simple things.
meanings.sent2: The disfunction of the heater made the room uncomfortably cold.
meanings.sent3: The disfunction of the robot's circuits made it dance uncontrollably!
meanings.sent4: The disfunction of the traffic lights caused chaos on the streets.
meanings.sent5: The disfunction of the phone's screen made it impossible to use.
